synopsis.text: Vega's journey begins in Mass Effect: Paragon Lost, setting the stage for the highly-anticipated Mass Effect '3'. As an accomplished Alliance Marine, James Vega takes command of an elite Special Forces squad, facing off against a mysterious extraterrestrial menace: The Collectors. Deployed on a distant colony within an isolated star system, Vega and his team are the civilians' only defense against a relentless invasion, hell-bent on seizing the population for inscrutable motives. Delve deeper into the Mass Effect universe and uncover the troubled history of its latest hero in this thrilling prequel!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
